Structs/SendReadReceiptRequest.html#/s:2.name: chatMessageId
Structs/SendReadReceiptRequest.html#/s:2.abstract: Id of the latest chat message read by the user.

Structs/SendChatMessageRequest.html#/s:2.name: senderDisplayName
Structs/SendChatMessageRequest.html#/s:2.abstract: The display name of the chat message sender. This property is used to populate sender name for push notifications.

Structs/ReadReceiptsCollection.html#/s:2.name: nextLink
Structs/ReadReceiptsCollection.html#/s:2.abstract: If there are more read receipts that can be retrieved, the next link will be populated.

Structs/ReadReceipt.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: chatMessageId
Structs/ReadReceipt.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: Id for the chat message that has been read. This id is generated by the server.

Structs/ReadReceipt.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: readOn
Structs/ReadReceipt.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: Read receipt timestamp. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/MultiStatusResponse.html#/s:22Az.name: multipleStatus
Structs/MultiStatusResponse.html#/s:22Az.abstract: The list of status information for each resource in the request.

Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.name: id
Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.abstract: Identifies the resource to which the individual status corresponds.

Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.name: statusCode
Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.abstract: The status code of the resource operation.

Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.name: message
Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.abstract: The message explaining why the operation failed for the resource identified by the key; null if the operation succeeded.

Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.name: type
Structs/IndividualStatusResponse.html#/s.abstract: Identifies the type of the resource to which the individual status corresponds.

Structs/CreateChatThreadRequest.html#/s:.name: members
Structs/CreateChatThreadRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Members to be added to the chat thread.

Structs/ChatThreadsInfoCollection.html#/.name: nextLink
Structs/ChatThreadsInfoCollection.html#/.abstract: If there are more chat threads that can be retrieved, the next link will be populated.

Structs/ChatThreadMembersCollection.html.name: nextLink
Structs/ChatThreadMembersCollection.html.abstract: If there are more chat threads that can be retrieved, the next link will be populated.

Structs/ChatThreadMember.html#/s:22Azure.name: id
Structs/ChatThreadMember.html#/s:22Azure.abstract: The id of the chat thread member in the format 8:acs:ResourceId_AcsUserId.

Structs/ChatThreadMember.html#/s:22Azure.name: displayName
Structs/ChatThreadMember.html#/s:22Azure.abstract: Display name for the chat thread member.

Structs/ChatThreadMember.html#/s:22Azure.name: shareHistoryTime
Structs/ChatThreadMember.html#/s:22Azure.abstract: Time from which the chat history is shared with the member. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/ChatThreadInfo.html#/s:22AzureCo.name: isDeleted
Structs/ChatThreadInfo.html#/s:22AzureCo.abstract: Flag if a chat thread is soft deleted.

Structs/ChatThreadInfo.html#/s:22AzureCo.name: lastMessageReceivedOn
Structs/ChatThreadInfo.html#/s:22AzureCo.abstract: The timestamp when the last message arrived at the server. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/ChatThread.html#/s:22AzureCommun.name: createdOn
Structs/ChatThread.html#/s:22AzureCommun.abstract: The timestamp when the chat thread was created. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/ChatMessagesCollection.html#/s:2.name: nextLink
Structs/ChatMessagesCollection.html#/s:2.abstract: If there are more chat messages that can be retrieved, the next link will be populated.

Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: id
Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: The id of the chat message. This id is server generated.

Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: senderDisplayName
Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: The display name of the chat message sender. This property is used to populate sender name for push notifications.

Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: createdOn
Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: The timestamp when the chat message arrived at the server. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: senderId
Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: The id of the chat message sender.

Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: deletedOn
Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: The timestamp when the chat message was deleted. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.name: editedOn
Structs/ChatMessage.html#/s:22AzureCommu.abstract: The timestamp when the chat message was edited. The timestamp is in ISO8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

Structs/AddChatThreadMembersRequest.html.name: members
Structs/AddChatThreadMembersRequest.html.abstract: Members to add to a chat thread.

Structs/AddChatThreadMembersRequest.html.name: AddChatThreadMembersRequest
Structs/AddChatThreadMembersRequest.html.abstract: Thread members to be added to the thread.

Structs/ChatMessagesCollection.html.name: ChatMessagesCollection
Structs/ChatMessagesCollection.html.abstract: Collection of chat messages for a particular chat thread.

Structs/ChatThreadMembersCollection.html.name: ChatThreadMembersCollection
Structs/ChatThreadMembersCollection.html.abstract: Collection of thread members belong to a particular thread.

Structs/CreateChatThreadRequest.html.name: CreateChatThreadRequest
Structs/CreateChatThreadRequest.html.abstract: Request payload for creating a chat thread.

Structs/ReadReceipt.html.name: ReadReceipt
Structs/ReadReceipt.html.abstract: A read receipt indicates the time a chat message was read by a recipient.

Structs/SendReadReceiptRequest.html.name: SendReadReceiptRequest
Structs/SendReadReceiptRequest.html.abstract: Request payload for sending a read receipt.

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient/Api.name: latest
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient/Api.abstract: The most recent API version of the

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient/Api.name: ApiVersion
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient/Api.abstract: API version of the to invoke. Defaults to the latest.

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.name: send(chatReadReceipt:chatThreadId:withOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.abstract: Sends a read receipt event to a thread, on behalf of a user.

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.name: listChatMessages(chatThreadId:withOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.abstract: Gets a list of messages from a thread.

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.name: sendTypingNotification(chatThreadId:withOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.abstract: Posts a typing event to a thread, on behalf of a user.

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.name: add(chatThreadMembers:chatThreadId:withOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.abstract: Adds thread members to a thread. If members already exist, no change occurs.

Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.name: listChatThreads(withOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/AzureCommunicationChatClient.htm.abstract: Gets the list of chat threads of a user.
